name: TenPages.com
overview:
TenPages.com is a crowdfunding platform for publishing books, based in The Netherlands.

The platform offers a connection between writers who want to have their book published professionally and readers who want to support their work and share in the upside. TenPages.com works with 35 different publishers for publishing the books that realise 10,000 euro funding (2,000 shares of 5 euro each).

The website of TenPages.com was launched February 2010. In the first 2,5 years of operation, the website has delivered 70 succesfully funded books of which 40 were already published the first 2,5 years. Amongst published books are the bestsellers Zo Zuidas and De urenfabriek, a non-fictional work and a novel both covering the working in the Amsterdam business area.

All categories of books are allowed on TenPages.com (children’s, business, novels, poetry, thrillers, fantasy, cookbooks etc.), except for scientific and school books.
